data.description: Perl wrapper for Alan Murta's gpc library
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Alan Murta's gpc (General Polygon Clipping) library is quite
    popular (so I'm told). I used this module as an add-on for the
    Math::Geometry::Planar package to extend it with polygon clipping
    (aka boolean operations on polygons). GPC is quite powerful and
    offers a reasonable performance (see
    http://www.cs.man.ac.uk/aig/staff/alan/software/ for detailed info
    about gpc and http://home.attbi.com/~msleonov/pbcomp.html for a
    comparison of gpc with other popular clipping software). On top of
    that, the gpc is well contained so wrapping it (using SWIG) wasn't a
    very though job. Enjoy ...
